PATH_FOUND: &cThere is already a path with this name.
NO_SKIN_FOUND: &cThe skin username/URL you have specified does not exist or is invalid.
INVALID_SIZE: &cThe position you have specified cannot exceed the limit.
COMMAND_ERROR: &cAn error occurred when executing this command. See console for more information.
TOO_FEW_ARGUMENTS: &cThis command does not contain enough arguments. Type &f/znpcs&c or view our documentation for a list/examples of existing arguments.
INVALID_CUSTOMIZE_ARGUMENTS: &cThe argument(s) you have specified is/are invalid. Type &f/znpcs&c or view our documentation for a list/examples of existing arguments.
INVALID_NAME_LENGTH: &cThe name you specified either too short or long. Please enter a positive integer of (3 to 16) characters.
NO_CONVERSATION_FOUND: &cThe conversation you have specified does not exist!
INVALID_NUMBER: &cThe ID you have specified is invalid. Please use positive integers only!
NO_NPC_FOUND: &cThe NPC you have specified does not exist.
CONVERSATION_FOUND: &cThere is already a conversation with this name.
NO_PERMISSION: &cYou do not have permission to execute this command.
PATH_START: &aSuccess! Move to create a path for your NPC. When finished, type &f/znpcs path exit&c to exit path creation.
INCORRECT_USAGE: &cThe arguments you specified are invalid. Type &f/znpcs&c for examples.
COMMAND_NOT_FOUND: &cThe command you specified does not exist!
NPC_NOT_FOUND: &cNo NPCs could be found with this ID!
NPC_FOUND: &cThere is already an NPC with this ID.
NO_PATH_FOUND: &cThe path you have specified does not exist.
METHOD_NOT_FOUND: &cThis method does not exist! Type &f/znpcs&c or view our documentation for a list/examples of existing methods.
NO_ACTION_FOUND: &cThis action does not exist! Type &f/znpcs&c or view our documentation for a list/examples of existing action types.
UNSUPPORTED_ENTITY: &cThis entity type not available in your current server version.
NOT_SUPPORTED_NPC_TYPE: &cThis NPC type doesn't exists or is not supported in your current server version.
